entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Wreckhouse
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:31 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Wreckhouse 07:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Temperature: -10.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa rising
Wind Chill: -16
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries this morning and early this afternoon. Flurries and local snow squalls beginning this afternoon. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Wind becoming west 20 gusting to 40 this afternoon. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries or snow squalls. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries and local snow squalls ending near midnight then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
